title: 艺术竞赛中心页-系列3
content:
[[=]]
+ 本组获奖作品：
+ Amamidori的//SCP-2146// 
+ Darkgreeny的//SCP-2256//
[[/=]]

[[module css]]
.content-panel {
    border: none;
    border-radius: 0px;
    background-color: #fff;
    margin: 10px 0 15px;
    box-shadow: none;
    box-shadow: none;
}
[[/module]]
[[div class="content-panel left-column"]]

[[include component:image-block name=http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/art-contest-hub-series-3/wrcillustration2030.jpg| caption= 来自wrcillustration的[[[SCP-2030]]]。大图请点[https://i.imgur.com/fwMgOk4.jpg 这里].]]

[[include component:image-block name=http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/art-contest-hub-series-3/Amamidori2146.png| caption= 来自Amamidori的[[[SCP-2146]]]。大图请点[https://i.imgur.com/HvsOFoe.png 这里].]]

[[include component:image-block name=http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/art-contest-hub-series-3/Darkgreeny2256.png| caption= 来自Darkgreeny的[http://www.scp-wiki.net/SCP-2256 SCP-2256: Very Tall Things]。大图请点[https://i.imgur.com/v7P0eEm.png 这里].]]

[[include component:image-block name=http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/art-contest-hub-series-3/Melled2295.jpg| caption= 来自Melled的[[[SCP-2295]]]。大图请点[https://i.imgur.com/laS6u8U.jpg 这里].]]

[[include component:image-block name=http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/art-contest-hub-series-3/PendletonMiller2372.jpg| caption= 来自Pendleton_Miller的[[[SCP-2372]]]。大图请点[https://i.imgur.com/kdvuAUV.jpg 这里].]]

[[include component:image-block name=http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/art-contest-hub-series-3/BrenZan2406.jpg| caption= 来自BrenZan的[[[SCP-2406]]]。大图请点[https://i.imgur.com/gwKYBMn.jpg 这里].]]

[[include component:image-block name=http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/art-contest-hub-series-3/JenJini2521.jpg| caption= 来自JenJini {{包含错字，不确定是否故意而为}}的[http://www.scp-wiki.net/SCP-2521 Untititled]。大图请点[https://i.imgur.com/1kG4k6H.jpg 这里]]]

[[include component:image-block name=http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/art-contest-hub-series-3/PhillipSchaffield2521.png| caption= 来自Phillip Schaffield的[[[SCP-2521]]]。大图请点[https://i.imgur.com/DN3x2T1.png 这里].]]

[[/div]]

[[div class="content-panel right-column"]]
[[include component:image-block name=http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/art-contest-hub-series-3/Kenoma2141.png| caption= 来自Kenoma的[[[SCP-2141]]]。大图请点[https://i.imgur.com/rLSaysI.png 这里].]]

author: GazerPara
